author: jay suvan
comment: Did a reset but does not show up on Android wear . Just isn't available. I have an LG g watch

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hi, Jay! We have the same smartwatch model for testing and the watch face works without any issues. Have you tried waiting 5-10 min to allow the resources to be uploaded from your phone to the watch? Sometimes it takes little longer than expected.

author: Ben Smith
comment: Would not load, waste of time and money

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It happens sometimes. Try to resync your watch and phone and wait a little bit (it may take up to 5-10 min). If it does not help, you can try to make a factory reset of the watch (not needed in most cases). If the problem persists, please share some more info with us, we're always ready to help  - wearables@boost.solutions

comment: Only gray face is available for ambient mode and cannot adjust full face on time vs ambient time.
title: Nice watch face but needs improving
